abstract: Letter from Mayor Eduardo Paes of Rio de Janeiro responds to July 3 Op-Ed by Vanessa Barbara and July 18 Op-Ed by Jules Boykoff criticizing city's fitness to host 2016 Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Answering criticisms, Rio’s mayor says the Games will be a success and “have been an opportunity to attract investments and improve citizens’ lives.”

headline.print_headline: The Olympics Will Be a Boon for Rio, the Mayor Says
headline.main: The Olympics Will Be a Boon for Rio, the Mayor Says
